name: Ship Rekt'd
description:
Global Game Jam Entry by Team Animal Puree (Theme: Waves).

Avast ye, scurvy dogs! Clean out your lugs holes 'n listen well. We be Animal Puree 'n this be our game; A Sinking Ship. A fearsomer pirate than ye never did sail th' seven seas, but even fearsome pirates get their ship sunk sometimes. Grab what booty you can, haul ye parrot-loving-self overboard and escape…'fore the sharks get a feast!

Credits:

Troy Atkinson

James Farr
